childDownloads.title: A New Threat Trailer
childDownloads.description: Watch the Red Faction: Armageddon trailer from the THQ Gamer's Week event.  How will Darius Mason deal with this new threat?

childDownloads.title: Commando Pack
childDownloads.description: Throw on the Commando uniform and add two new weapons to your arsenal with the Red Faction: Armageddon Commando Pack.  The Plasma Thrower sprays an unforgiving stream of destruction that lays waste to enemies and obstacles.  Dual wield two Laser Pistols to decimate the plague.  Pick these up from any weapons locker in the campaign or deal death from their barrels to the merciless hordes in Infestation Mode.

childDownloads.title: Red Faction: Armageddon - Demo
childDownloads.description: In Red Faction: Armageddon, harness the destructive powers of the Nano-Forge to transform the world into your weapon and bring it crashing down upon your enemies. Your journey will take you from the frozen poles to the molten core of Mars as you wage war against the Red Faction’s greatest enemy yet.

childDownloads.title: Mr. Toots
childDownloads.description: You can now own the most cuddly creature on Mars. Watch him fly in on a rainbow of happiness and prance around with your Avatar!

childDownloads.title: Red Faction: Armageddon - Path to War
childDownloads.description: The Earth Defense Force has been defeated, and after centuries of oppression, Mars is finally free. For a time, there was peace. Yet from the forgotten ashes rose Adam Hale, scarred from years of struggle, seeking ultimate revenge against the Red Faction. His target, the one thing that keeps the surface of Mars habitable for thousands of colonists, is the Terraformer. Relive the battle for the Terraformer through four incredible new missions featuring aerial flyers, orbital strikes, and the Red Faction armored surface tank. Unlock two destructive new weapons, the Sharpshooter Gun and Shard Cannon, while earning ten new achievements in this thrilling new mission pack for Red Faction: Armageddon!

childDownloads.title: Recon Pack
childDownloads.description: Suit up in the Recon uniform and add two new weapons to your arsenal with the Red Faction: Armageddon Recon Pack.  The Arc Welder immobilizes and electrocutes clusters of enemies.  The XNG-5000 launches devastating Nanite-filled projectiles that seek out targets and dissolves them.  Pick these up from any weapons locker in the campaign or deal death from their barrels to the merciless hordes in Infestation Mode.

childDownloads.title: Ruin Pack
childDownloads.description: Red Faction: Armageddon's Ruin Mode is all about one thing: destruction. In "Free Play" you'll wreak havoc on a variety of maps with unlimited time and infinite ammo. "Challenge" is a race against the clock to do as much damage as possible in a limited time. Earn extra points and bonus minutes for extreme annihilation. Break the high score to unlock new maps. Afterwards, flaunt your catastrophic conquests on the Leaderboards by comparing your ranking with friends or every player worldwide!

childDownloads.title: Red Faction: Armageddon ComicCon Trailer
childDownloads.description: Download The Red Faction: Armageddon ComicCon Trailer! The World Is Your Weapon!

childDownloads.title: Red Faction: Armageddon Gamer Pic Pack #1
childDownloads.description: This set of 10 Gamer Pictures features Darius and Kara, along with numerous alien images, and more!
